description: The Darklore Girl is part of the audience appearing out of nowhere when http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L.System] attempts to play their latest song only for their friend http://anidb.net/ch5896 [Yoriko]. She fights against the http://anidb.net/ch40666 [WIZ-DOM girl] as neither of both wants the other to get near http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta].
name: Darklore no Otome
